H0.text: Sixties pop music - Who recorded the 1962 hit record 'Sheila'. Bobby Vee

H1.text: Sixties pop music - Who recorded the 1962 hit record 'Sheila'. Neil Sedaka

H2.text: Sixties pop music - Who recorded the 1962 hit record 'Sheila'. Gene Pitney

H3.text: Sixties pop music - Who recorded the 1962 hit record 'Sheila'. Tommy Roe

A4.text: The new arrangement of 'Sheila' became a Billboard number 1 hit in the U.S. and Australia in 1962.

A5.text: Roe re-recorded the song for ABC-Paramount in 1962, with a new hook: an insistent drum paradiddle modeled on the 1957 hit 'Peggy Sue'.
